items.sentence: My interest in politics is strictly academic.
My mother divided the cake into eight pieces.
Tom doesn\'t want to talk about this anymore.
We just have to keep doing what we\'re doing.
I just wanted to see you and hear your voice.
I know Tom is going to try to arrive on time.
Tom asked me to stop by his house after work.
Tom asked me whether I liked his plan or not.
Tom asked me why I never learned how to swim.
Tom ate a quick lunch then went back to work.
I didn\'t have time today. I\'ll go tomorrow.
I\'ll do that regardless of the consequences.
I\'ll see what else I can find out about Tom.
Tom found a picture of Mary on John\'s phone.
Can you get that to me by the end of the day?
Tom was released from prison on October 20th.
Tom was sleeping when Mary rang the doorbell.
Tom was standing at the bar, drinking a beer.
Tom was stopped for breaking the speed limit.
I couldn\'t explain to Tom what was going on.
